attributes.action: We need a general election now before the 31 October 2019
attributes.additional_details:
Recently, from the daily newpapers and directly from the parliament on TV, we have seen behaviour which is shaming to behold, considering that anyone may be watching at home or abroad. 
MPs changing parties, MPs yelling at the top of their voices etc. No party at the moment has an overall majority, so the work of the House of Commons cannot go on. We, the people feel totally powerless. Only a General Election has a chance to sort it out. Let the people decide!
attributes.background: Having seen how chaotic the House of Commons has been recently, it is obvious that nothing will be achieved without a mandate from the people in the form of a new General Election
